plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 A bunny eats me for lunch.

plant.question: I have a trunk and leaves, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be red, yellow, or pink.

plant.question: I am long and green. I grow on a vine and make a yummy pickle. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can eat me on a sandwich.

plant.question: I have prickly needles and stay green all year round. I'm often decorated for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am a type of tree.
❄️ I don't lose my needles when it's cold.

plant.question: I am small and green, and cover the ground like a carpet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am soft to walk on.

plant.question: I grow underground and have layers that make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 😥 I can make your eyes water.

plant.question: I am a fruit that is long and yellow. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I peel before you eat me.

plant.question: I have seeds inside and grow on a tall plant. I can be popped and eaten at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🎬 People eat me while watching movies.

plant.question: I'm a big, round fruit with a green rind. Inside, I am red and juicy with black seeds. What am I?

food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to eat me. What am I?
I am round and red, and I grow on trees. Sometimes I'm in your lunchbox. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me, but not from the Evil Queen
🦷 An apple a day keeps the doctor away
🔴 My skin is usually red, but can also be green or yellow

food.question: I am white and cold, and you can eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 I am often served in a bowl or cone
🥶 I am very cold and yummy

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ Eating me is good for your eyes.

food.question: I am small and green, and I grow in a pod. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a type of legume
🟢 I am often served as a side dish.
👪 I usually come in a group

food.question: I am made from milk, and I can be hard or soft. You can eat me with crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I come in many different flavors and textures.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and you bake me in an oven. You can put butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often eaten with soup or sandwiches
🔥 You need heat to make me.
🌾 I am a staple food in many cultures.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green inside. I have lots of tiny black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I share my name with a bird from New Zealand
🟤 My outside is fuzzy and brown.
🟢 My inside is green and juicy.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like a tiny tree.

food.question: I am a drink made from roasted beans. Some people add milk and sugar to me. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ Some people need me to wake up
🌎 I am grown in many different countries.
